label:label.xlink:title: If in tab 'Z 10.01 Critical Information Systems (general information) (CIS 1)', the column c0050 'Group entity responsible for the system - Entity name' matches one row with the column c0010 'Name' in tab 'Z 01.00 Organisational structure (ORG)', then the column c0060 'Group entity responsible for the system - Entity code' should match column c0020 'Entity code' of that same row in tab 'Z 01.00 Organisational structure (ORG)'

gen:link.label:label: If in tab 'Z 10.01 Critical Information Systems (general information) (CIS 1)', the column c0050 'Group entity responsible for the system - Entity name' matches one row with the column c0010 'Name' in tab 'Z 01.00 Organisational structure (ORG)', then the column c0060 'Group entity responsible for the system - Entity code' should match column c0020 'Entity code' of that same row in tab 'Z 01.00 Organisational structure (ORG)'
